cardDetail.title: Greek Salad
cardDetail.description: The famous Greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago styled feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic, rosemary croutons.

cardDetail.title: Bruschetta
cardDetail.description: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil; made perfect for an evening dinner.

cardDetail.title: Lemon Dessert
cardDetail.description: This comes straight from Grandma's recipe book. Every last ingredient has been sourced and is as authentic as can be imagined.

testimonailsData.name: Antony Clifton
testimonailsData.review: The cozy ambiance at Little Lemon Restaurant perfectly complements their delicious, zesty dishes. A delightful spot for fresh flavors and warm hospitality!
